headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://maps.googleapis.com https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' https://babytilly.s3.amazonaws.com https://lh3.googleusercontent.com http://www.w3.org/2000/; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com/maps https://www.google.com/recaptcha/;
